name: Veerapathran, Anand
resume_snippet: Anand Veerapathran, Ph.D, M.Sc., B. Sc.  PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY:	  Seasoned CMC leader with over 19 years of research expertise in immunotherapy (Tregs, TILs), transplant immunology, immuno-oncology, and parasitic immunology, complemented by 8+ years of industry experience in cell therapy process development, cGMP manufacturing, technology transfer, and early-stage research. Proven track record leading BLA-enabling activities, IND submissions, and advancing gene-edited TIL programs, contributing
